name: venmorph
description: Venmo-style payment requests using Flare oracles & XRPL settlement

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install && cd ../attestor && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run contracts:dev" "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run attestor:dev"
scripts.test: npm run contracts:test && npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
scripts.contracts:deploy:coston2: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network coston2
scripts.contracts:deploy:flare: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network flare
scripts.frontend:start: cd frontend && npm run build && npx serve -s build -l 3000
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run contracts:compile
scripts.demo: npm run contracts:deploy:local && npm run dev

author: Venmorph Team
